concept.title: RPC
concept.shortdesc: The RPC origin enables connectivity between two StreamSets RPC pipelines. The RPC origin reads data passed from an RPC destination. Use the RPC origin as part of an RPC destination pipeline.

conbody.p: originsRPCRPC originsoverviewYou can use RPC pipelines across a single Data Collector instance on a single machine, or across a local network or the public internet to a remote Data Collector. You can configure the origin to use SSL for secure connectivity.
When you configure the RPC origin, you define the port that the origin listens to for data. The port number must be specified in one of the RPC connections defined in the RPC destination.
Similarly, the RPC ID in the RPC origin must match the RPC ID used in the RPC destination.
